name: DealershipAI Prompt Pack v1.0
description: Comprehensive prompt templates for automotive dealership AI optimization and analysis
author: DealershipAI Team

prompts.name: Comprehensive SEO Audit
prompts.description: Generate a detailed SEO audit report for automotive dealerships
prompts.template:
# SEO Audit Report for {{dealershipName}}

## Executive Summary
Analyzing the SEO performance of {{dealershipName}} located in {{location}}, specializing in {{brand}} vehicles.

## Technical SEO Analysis
- Core Web Vitals Score: {{coreWebVitals}}/100
- Mobile Responsiveness: {{mobileScore}}/100
- Page Load Speed: {{pageSpeed}}ms
- SSL Security: {{sslStatus}}

## Content Analysis
{{#if hasInventoryPages}}
✅ Inventory pages are optimized for search engines
{{else}}
❌ Inventory pages need SEO optimization
{{/if}}

## Keyword Performance
Target Keywords:
{{#each targetKeywords}}
- {{this}}: Current ranking position {{@index}}
{{/each}}

## Local SEO Assessment
- Google Business Profile Score: {{gbpScore}}/100
- NAP Consistency: {{napConsistency}}%
- Local Citations: {{citationCount}} found
- Customer Reviews: {{reviewCount}} reviews ({{averageRating}} avg)

## Recommendations
1. **Priority**: Fix Core Web Vitals issues to improve user experience
2. **High Impact**: Optimize inventory pages with schema markup
3. **Local Focus**: Improve Google Business Profile completeness
4. **Content Strategy**: Create location-specific landing pages

## Competitive Analysis
Compared to {{competitorCount}} local competitors:
- SEO Score Ranking: #{{seoRanking}} of {{totalDealers}}
- Gap to Leader: {{gapToLeader}} points

## Next Steps
Implement recommendations in priority order to achieve:
- Estimated traffic increase: {{trafficIncrease}}%
- Projected lead increase: {{leadIncrease}} per month
- ROI timeline: {{roiTimeline}} months

variables.name: hasInventoryPages
variables.description: Whether inventory pages are properly optimized

variables.name: totalDealers
variables.description: Total number of dealers in market

variables.name: gapToLeader
variables.description: SEO score gap to market leader

prompts.name: AI Answer Engine Optimization Strategy
prompts.description: Create AEO strategy for improving visibility in AI-powered search results
prompts.template:
# AI Answer Engine Optimization Strategy
## For {{dealershipName}} - {{brand}} Dealer

### Current AEO Performance
**Overall AEO Score**: {{aeoScore}}/100

**Breakdown by AI Platform**:
- ChatGPT Citations: {{chatgptCitations}}
- Claude Mentions: {{claudeMentions}}
- Perplexity References: {{perplexityRefs}}
- Google AI Overviews: {{googleAIRefs}}

### Content Gap Analysis
{{#if hasFAQSection}}
✅ FAQ section exists but needs optimization
{{else}}
❌ Missing FAQ section - critical for AEO success
{{/if}}

{{#if hasStructuredData}}
✅ Some structured data implemented
{{else}}
❌ No structured data found - immediate priority
{{/if}}

### AEO Optimization Roadmap

#### Phase 1: Foundation (Weeks 1-2)
1. **Implement FAQ Schema Markup**
   - Target Questions:
   {{#each commonQuestions}}
   - "{{this}}"
   {{/each}}

2. **Create Conversational Content**
   - Transform features into natural Q&A format
   - Focus on {{primaryService}} inquiries

#### Phase 2: Content Expansion (Weeks 3-4)
1. **Build Answer-Focused Pages**
   - "How to finance a {{brand}} in {{location}}"
   - "What's included in {{primaryService}} at {{dealershipName}}?"
   - "Why choose {{dealershipName}} over competitors?"

2. **Optimize for Voice Search**
   - Long-tail conversational keywords
   - Local modifier integration

#### Phase 3: Authority Building (Weeks 5-8)
1. **Expert Content Creation**
   - {{brand}} buying guides
   - Maintenance tips and schedules
   - Local market insights

2. **Citation Building**
   - Industry publication outreach
   - Local media engagement
   - Expert commentary opportunities

### Success Metrics
- Target AEO Score: {{targetAEOScore}}/100 ({{improvementNeeded}} point increase)
- AI Platform Citation Goals:
  - ChatGPT: {{chatgptTarget}} monthly mentions
  - Claude: {{claudeTarget}} monthly mentions
  - Perplexity: {{perplexityTarget}} monthly references

### ROI Projection
- Estimated monthly traffic from AI search: +{{estimatedTraffic}} visitors
- Projected lead increase: {{projectedLeads}} per month
- Expected revenue impact: ${{revenueImpact}}/month
- Payback period: {{paybackPeriod}} months

### Implementation Timeline
Total implementation time: {{totalWeeks}} weeks
Estimated budget: ${{estimatedBudget}}
Expected ROI: {{expectedROI}}%

variables.name: googleAIRefs
variables.description: Number of Google AI Overview references

variables.name: hasFAQSection
variables.description: Whether the site has an FAQ section

variables.name: primaryService
variables.description: Primary service offered (sales, service, parts, etc.)

prompts.name: Competitive Analysis Report
prompts.description: Generate comprehensive competitive analysis for dealership market positioning
